caption.p: Microregion random effects estimated by the fitted model, presented in standard deviation units. Map created using QGIS version 3.6.3 (QGIS Development Team, 2019. QGIS Geographic Information System. Open Source Geospatial Foundation Project. http://qgis.osgeo.org). Map tiles by Stamen Design, under CC BY 3.0.
